feed.title: Joshua Clark Gilman
feed.subtitle: This is a website designed by two planetary ecologists trying to avoid a deadly spice buildup.

entry.title: The true cost of gas
entry.content:
THIS IS A TEST

At the gas station I saw that someone put a sticker of Joe Biden pointing to the gas price with a caption reading: “I did that.” That got me thinking.

What is the true cost of gas?

Before people blame politicians for gas prices, they should think long and hard about the true cost of gas.

What is the true cost of gas? Before people blame politicians for gas prices, they should think long and hard about the true cost of gas.
